name: ZERO HASTE
description:
Just a normal day on deck:

Maneuver your ship past menacing floatsam and be sure not to topple it's load. Losing all your goods to the sea means one unhappy customer — and extra polution to the ocean.

Made for Waterkant Jam 2019 by:

  • Felix Skiba (Audio, Music)
  • Jonas Mumm (Code, Design)
  • Lara Teegen (3D Art, Textures)
  • Linus Timm (Code, Design)
